title: EQT: From Nordic Roots to Global Dominance
snippet: EQT’s rise from a dinner discussion in Stockholm’s Gamla Stan in 1993 to a global investment leader by 2024 exemplifies its dedication to responsible ownership and value creation. Founded in 1994 with support from Investor AB and the Wallenberg ...

title: What is Brief History of EQT AB Company? – MatrixBCG.com
snippet: EQT AB was formally founded on November 22, 1994, emerging from discussions between Conni Jonsson and Claes Dahlbäck. Inspired by the Wallenberg family's philosophy, Jonsson established EQT with backing from Investor AB, SEB, and AEA Investors.

title: What is Brief History of EQT AB Company? – PortersFiveForce.com
snippet: The EQT AB history began on September 9, 1994, in Stockholm, Sweden, founded by Conni Jonsson and a consortium led by the Wallenberg family's Investor AB.
